subject: statistics
title: Sample Correlation
contentHtml:
The sample correlation coefficient measures the linear relationship between two random variables.

It's a fundamental concept in descriptive statistics and is used extensively in machine learning and artificial intelligence to understand relationships between features.
name: Pearson Correlation Coefficient
problemHtml: Suppose we have two variables, x and y, representing the height and weight of a group of people. Calculate the sample correlation coefficient.

intuition: The sample correlation coefficient provides a measure of how well we can predict one variable based on another. It's a valuable tool in machine learning for feature engineering and understanding relationships between variables.

subject: statistics
title: Sample Correlation
contentHtml:
The sample correlation coefficient measures the linear relationship between two variables in a dataset.

It's a fundamental concept in descriptive statistics and is used to understand the strength and direction of the relationship between two variables.
name: Pearson Correlation Coefficient
problemHtml: Suppose we have a dataset of exam scores and corresponding grades. We want to calculate the sample correlation coefficient between these two variables.
